<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Spiritual Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4107) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Scions of Domora](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=202)

**Prerequisites**
[Scion of Domora Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4106)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a weapon with at least one [fundamental rune](/Rules.aspx?ID=738) and your familiar is adjacent to you or in your space.

</column>

---

Your spirit guide enhances your attacks with occult power. Make a Strike with a weapon that has at least one fundamental rune. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. The Strike has the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune and deals an additional 2d6 force damage. If your weapon has a [_major striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) rune, this Strike instead deals 3d6 force damage.

<title level="2">Spiritual Strike leads to...</title>
[Spiritual Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4111)
